title: Los Cabos Beachfront Luxury with Four Heated Pools, Butler Service & US$150 Daily Resort Credit (Select Packages Only)
description: Discover the epitome of Baja California luxury at Solaz, A Luxury Collection Resort, Los Cabos. This architectural marvel, set alongside the azure Sea of Cortez and the rugged Sierra de la Laguna mountains, blends the region's natural beauty with its unique contemporary design. Indulge in farm-to-table dining and flavours of the sea at Mako, taste inventive breakfasts with a sparkling sea view at Cascabel, or settle into a premium drop from La Cava, the exclusive wine cellar belonging to Al Pairo by Chef Martin Arellano. For unparralled relaxation, treat yourself to a massage at Ojo de Liebre Spa, or float the day away in one of the resort's heated infinity pools overlooking the ocean.
location_description: Solaz, a Luxury Collection Resort, Los Cabos
offer_address: KM 18.5 Carretera Transpeninsular CSL-SJC Access B Cabo Real, 23405 San José del Cabo, B.C.S., Mexico

title: Five-Star Mexico Oceanfront Escape w. Five Restaurants, Huge Spa & 18-Hole Golf Course
description: A soaring vision in white at the tip of Baja California Sur, Marquis Los Cabos, All-Inclusive Resort & Spa is the desert mirage dreams are made of, positioned on Mexico's sparkling oceanfront. Part of the exclusive Leading Hotels of the World collection - Mexico West’, Marquis Los Cabos hits the right balance between sophistication and cool. Visit the resort’s five signature restaurants, dive into one of three swimming pools, tune out at the holistic spa and putt at the 18-hole golf course surrounding this multi-award-winning retreat.
location_description: Marquis Los Cabos, All-Inclusive Resort & Spa
offer_address: Carretera Transpeninsular Km 21.5 Fracc. Cabo Real, San Jose del Cabo Baja California Sur, Mexico, 23400
